education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Field Of Study Management Information Systems

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Worked with ReactJS, NextJS and NodeJS web applications.

projects.title: Learn Coding App
projects.category: Full-stack application using React.js for the front-end and Express.js and MongoDB for the back-end, With responsive design. In this app, you can watch all the videos and filter it by category as a visitor, if you sign up you will be able to add comments and add the videos to your list.

projects.title: Currency Converter App
projects.category: This application allows you to convert currencies and show you the live currency rates at that moment. We built this application using React.js and APIs for the back-end in one week as a team with my teammates Amany, Taha, and Maha.

projects.title: Projects Tracker App
projects.category: Full-stack application using Ruby on Rails, With responsive design. It allows you to add projects and tasks and mark as completed to the tasks you completed.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.category: This tic tac toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript , With responsive design. Where you can play with AI or friend while keeping your scores.

testimonials.text: As the Lead Software Engineering Instructor for GA/Misk, I had the privilege of working with Wijdan for 3 months during the Software Engineering Immersive program.  Wijdan is a talented developer and quick learner.  She is a strong teammate and would often teach other students in the classroom if they were confused about a technical topic.  Wijdan's projects went above and beyond our project requirements by researching and implementing technologies that we did not teach.  Wijdan's problem solving and programming skills along with her communication and leadership skills make Wijdan a stellar technical team member.  I give her my highest recommendation and can not wait to see what she does next!
testimonials.user: Michael Finneran | Software Engineer, Consultant, Educator
